title: Googe ?
content:
In the Valentine's Day spirit, Google bears a typically cheeky custom logo.

[http://typetrust.com/googlevalentine.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019051951/http:/typetrust.com/googlevalentine.jpg "http://typetrust.com/googlevalentine.jpg")

Tasty 'g', but where's the 'l'?
author: silas

comments.content: The 'l' went last-minute valentines day shopping and got stuck in the snow.
